courses.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the core concepts of JavaScript including variables, functions, objects, and asynchronous programming. Perfect for beginners starting their coding journey.

courses.title: HTML & CSS Mastery
courses.description: Learn web fundamentals with HTML5 and modern CSS3. Create beautiful, responsive designs and master layouts with flexbox, grid, and animations. Build professional-looking websites from scratch.

courses.title: React Complete Course
courses.description: Learn React from the ground up to advanced level. Master components, hooks, state management, and build interactive web applications. Create real-world projects with React best practices.

courses.title: Advanced JavaScript & ES6+
courses.description: Deep dive into advanced JavaScript concepts including closures, prototypes, async/await, generators, and modern ES6+ features. Become a JavaScript expert with real-world project examples.
